lines.text:
[after girl runs upstairs crying]
What seems to be the trouble?
Ha ha ha ha. She's crying with happiness. She's gonna be married.
lines.character: Mugsie Long, proprietor of Ye Mariner's Rest
Mugsie Long, proprietor of Ye Mariner's Rest

lines.text:
[after a great big double take]
Can you beat that?
I'll go for the same meal as he is.

[to Stan]
You cannot have a meal!
What do you mean I can't have a meal?

[Whines as he got comfused]
I thought you were fighting.
NO! I am the manager, And you are the fighter!
[He leaves poor Stan sobbing and starving]
